snippet: Militants suspected of being members of Boko Haram attacked a military prison in northern Nigeria, freeing some of their comrades but also suffering heavy losses.
abstract: Militants suspected of being members of Boko Haram attack military prison in northern Nigeria, freeing some of their comrades but also suffering heavy losses.

byline.contributor: Hamza Idris contributed reporting from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Militants suspected of being members of Boko Haram attacked a military prison in northern Nigeria, freeing some of their comrades but also suffering heavy losses.

headline.main: Shock as Militants Attack Nigerian Military Prison
headline.print_headline: Shock as Militants Attack Nigerian Military Prison
